fullText:
Preserver’s Call

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Kalashtar, invoker, Covenant of Preservation class feature
Benefit: When you use a divine daily attack power on your turn, you can pull each ally within 5 squares of you 1 square instead of using the normal benefit of your Covenant Manifestation.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 136.
